welcome here judge thank you for
inviting me how bad was it how
oppressive how totalitarian was that
were the events of six o'clock in the
morning last Friday this was almost a
surreal experience judge at six o'clock
in the morning there was a pounding on
my door I was sleeping on the second
floor with my wife who is
hearing-impaired
virtually deaf and I came downstairs to
open the door staring down the barrel of
two assault weapons there were 29 FBI
agents in Swat gear who had completely
surrounded my home there were 17
vehicles with their lights going
including two armored vehicles in the
front yard in the front street they had
blocked off the entire Street how a CNN
camera crew got there I'm really not
sure
I live on a canal they had pulled two in
fibia units with frogman up to the back
gate to the back of the house the entire
back of the house was surrounded by
agents all of them brandishing sidearms
and assault weapons pointed at my home I
do not own a gun I'm a strong supporter
of the Second Amendment but I do not own
a gun I do not have a valid passport I
the idea that I would destroy evidence
I've been under investigation for two
years I've destroyed nothing but if I
was going to destroy evidence why would
I wait till last Thursday the judge gave
me a surety bond on my signature proving
I'm not a flight risk I was told to come
out with my hands up I did I was told
that I was under arrest no one read me
my rights I might add I was told to put
my hands behind my back I was wearing a
Roger stone did nothing wrong t-shirt
you can get those at 1776 dot shop the
proceeds
go to my Legal Defense Fund as wearing a
pair of shorts but I was barefooted they
said who else is in the house I said my
wife they said who else I said my wife
that's it they said are you sure I said
I'm positive plus two dogs and three
cats I'm a dog lover I'm an animal lover
you can read my activities for animal
welfare on Daily Caller right I was if I
was afraid that they would go upstairs I
think my wife was not complying to an
order that she could not hear and shoot
her did they take your wife out of the
house Roger they did I was made to stand
in the street a handcuffed in my bare
feet they brought my wife out in her
nightgown also in bare feet to stand
next to me even though she's not accused
of any crime they told me they had a
search warrant to search the premises
they also had a search warrant to search
the infowar studio that I use in Oakland
Park Florida
as well as a warrant to search an
apartment in New York that I no longer
have because the lease is up January
31st and all my possessions had been
already shipped back to Florida okay you
have you have competent counsel who must
have had some communication with Muller
as his crew why do you think this
extraordinary over-the-top show of force
what they just call you on the phone and
say or your lawyer on the phone and say
can mr. stone he's been indicted can he
appear at 8 o'clock this morning before
a magistrate yes they knew who my
counsel was they had communicated with
my counsel they knew that they could say
I would have voluntarily surrendered
gladly because I would have been a lot
better dressed for my mug shot photos
but instead they want to intimidate me
and they want to poison the jury pool
they treated me like El Chapo they used
fewer men to take down Pablo Escobar or
bin Laden so by treating me like a drug
kingpin they send a message to potential
jurors that I'm public enemy number one
I'm a non-violent man I'm a I'm a
libertarian
and they they you know I'm against
violence I'm against war for that matter
so the this notion of this over-the-top
display of raw power
it was meant to not only intimidate me
but intimidate certain witnesses in my
case who they're counting on to bear
false witness against me one of the
allegations against you is that you
intimidated a witness what is your
defense to that out of completely out of
context I intimidated nobody now the
witness in question judge threatened to
put a bullet in the head of an
exculpatory witness who went before the
muller grand jury who who is a friend of
mine he also threatened to have a woman
falsely accused me of sexual assault
this is a this is a witness who lied
before the grand jury said he was not
the source my source for the
significance and October timing of the
WikiLeaks disclosures I released 30
pages of text messages that prove that I
was truthful in that he lied you won't
read it in the New York Times or The
Washington Post or The Wall Street
Journal so that is completely out of
context there there are five there are
five counts leveled against you for
lying to Congress do you have in your
possession the transcripts of what you
said to Congress which the grand jury
claims constituted the five lies no I'm
by law not entitled to have a copy of my
testimony my lawyers can inspect my
testimony in a sealed room at the House
of Representatives but that they are not
allowed to take notes I think there's a
due process issue there they have
reviewed it I believe that I was
truthful that is a distortion of my
testimony but congressman Adam Schiff
and congressman Eric swallow as well
have been beating this drum for a year
they will be both called to the stand
and they will be vigorously questioned
as well other members of the House
Intelligence Committee such as trey
Gowdy someone I have huge respect for to
see if they believe that I was
the truthful this is a distortion of my
testimony clearly I cannot rebut every
charge here because there's just not
enough time right but I will plead not
guilty and I and I have substantial
documentary evidence to refute every bit
of these charges since since the
indictment came down to absolute right
since the indictment came down if you're
heard from the president I have not
other than reading his tweets I think
people understand that the president has
been advised by his lawyer and some of
the deep Staters on his White House
staff that he's not speak to me my
lawyers have suggested it would be
better off if I did not speak to him if
I'm a preempt a question that was asked
all weekend no I have not discussed a
pardon with anyone
I have publicly advocated a pardon in
op-ed pieces for Julian Assange who I
think is not a Russian asset but a
journalist doing what all journalists do
I have written the president advocating
a posthumous pardon for marcus garvey
the early civil rights leader who I
think was railroaded by the FBI in the
20s but I've never discussed a pardon
with anyone do you envision any end to
this other than a jury trial not at this
time I mean they judge shopt they had
this assigned to judge Amy Jackson
Berman who was the hanging judge in the
mana fork case they they do that by
trying to connect this to the rush the
17 Russian case in which I was cited as
having communicated with gusoff ur 2.0
an ex post facto communication six weeks
after the WikiLeaks had already
published the the Hillary Clinton emails
the content context and timing of that
communication demonstrates that is
entirely legally benign its innocuous
even in that indictment it says no
American knowingly
communicated with the Russian no
American has violated the law but they
use that to get me in front of the same
judge their judge and Obama appointee
does
the government believed that there was a
conspiracy between the Trump campaign
and foreign nationals whether it's
Julian Assange or whether it's Russians
and that you were integral to that
conspiracy because if they believe it
they didn't charge you with it no they
do not allege that I'm not charged with
conspiracy
I'm not charged with Russian collusion
I'm not charged with WikiLeaks
collaboration I had no advanced
knowledge of the source or content of
the WikiLeaks disclosures I played no
role whatsoever in their in their
dissemination or their release any
information that I did relay to members
of the Trump campaign was public
information published in the newspaper
or broadcast on TV Julian Assange
announced to the world on July 22nd of
2016 that he had material on Hillary
Clinton and he would publish it he said
it again on Fox on August 24th this was
not a state secret everything that I
communicated which was extremely minimal
and for some of which I frankly forgot
was public information no secret there
do you see yourself cooperating with
Muller in any way you sort of dropped
that hint yesterday in an interview on
ABC well I think that's a bit of a
bastardization of what I said what I
said was I won't I will tell the truth
to mr. Muller if I am asked I won't tell
the truth I have told the truth
consistently even though some would say
otherwise but that they are incorrect
so if cooperating means I won't plead
the fifth amendment I will answer
questions I'm happy to answer questions
I don't know what else he may be
investigating I mean if Steve Benton did
something wrong and I know anything
about it I would be more than happy to
say so I don't know that mr. Bain has
done anything wrong well will you tell
Joe will you talk to Muller's people
about your communications with the
President of the United States and with
Donald Trump before he was president
I see no reason why not to there's
nothing inappropriate or illegal or
wrong with those communications they're
anak Lluis or their political in nature
Donald Trump has been a friend of mine
for 40 years I have deep affection for
him and his family he attended my
wedding to my wife Nydia I was at two of
his weddings to Marla maples and to the
first lady who I think is a wonderful
person of deep affection for his
children I knew his parents both very
well I attended their wakes and funerals
I had a high regard for his
brother-in-law who was an excellent
attorney in New Jersey I have a huge
affection and respect for his sister
who's a fine federal judge those there's
never any discussion between the
president and I of WikiLeaks or the
WikiLeaks disclosures you know I did
hear Wolf Blitzer say the opposite
yesterday but Wolf Blitzer is not a
journalist right well Blitzer is a
bald-faced liar all right you you
mentioned New Jersey shortly after your
interview with George Stephanopoulos the
former governor of New Jersey Governor
Christie had this to say about your
current legal plight I think if he
decides to go to trial he's in very very
grave danger everyone is presumed
innocent George and so is he
but the indictment I think is a pretty
damning indictment chris Christie know
anything about this indictment other
than what the what the words are on the
floor on the pages I don't know how any
lawyer could understand the indictment
without reading the full transcript of
my testimony to see how out of context
these annotations are I think that's
irresponsible for a member of the bar
but count on Chris Christie to kick him
in while he's down uh Jerry Corsi whom
you and I both know told I remember the
legal analyst at MSNBC plants that
testify against you what is he talking
about do you know yes dr. Corsi has said
has maintained two falsehoods about me
none of which are contained in this
indictment he says that a memo he wrote
me regarding the Podesta brothers
lucrative business dealings in Russia
was meant as a cover-up
for the fact that he had told me that
Podesta's emails had been stolen that is
false there's no evidence that
corroborates that other than the
alcoholic haze of his memory
it is categorically false it's also
illogical my tweet regarding the
Podesta's which is consistently edited
by the mainstream media rain in the New
York Times as I said the Podesta
brothers that's two people the Podesta's
a Time in the barrel will come referring
to the fact that I was going to try to
disseminate to the media accurate
information about their Russian business
dealings he there was no reason for a
cover-up my tweet was not controversial
for six weeks until WikiLeaks did

think had this suggested to him by the
special prosecutors he also says that I
knew in advance about the NBC Billy Bush

genitals tape and that I urged him to

change or time his disclosures that is
also a whole cloth that is completely
false
last question do you think that Muller
and company believe that they can

Rick Gates Mike Flynn George papadopolis
well yes because I think they have tried
to destroy me financially so I need
people to go to stone defense fund calm
for two years they have leaked that my
my arrest was imminent my indictment was
imminent and that has destroyed my
business in December I lost my health
and life insurance unable to play the
premiums I liquidated a small fund I had
for the college education of my
grandchildren I had to sell my car they
have dried up my book sales through the

well we're fighting a horrific fight

because I have a platform there every

therefore if I'm broke enough perhaps

commit
because I don't have the resources to

first I am announcing that a grand jury
in Seattle has returned an indictment
that it alleges 10 federal crimes by two
affiliates of telecommunications
corporation Huawei Technologies
according to the indictment in 2012
Huawei began a concerted effort to steal
information about a robot that t-mobile
used to test mobile phones in an effort
to build their own robot wall ways
engineers allegedly violated
confidentiality and non-disclosure
agreements with t-mobile by secretly
taking photos of the robot measuring it
and even stealing it stealing a piece of
it I'm also announcing today a grand
jury in New York has returning
indictment alleging 13 additional crimes
committed by Huawei its CFO its
affiliate in Iran and one of its
subsidiaries here in the United States
the criminal activity alleged in this
indictment goes back at least 10 years
and goes all the way to the top of the
company as early as 2007 Huawei
employees allegedly began to
misrepresent the company's relationship
with its Iranian affiliate which is
called sky called Huawei employees
allegedly told banking partners that
Huawei had sold its ownership interest
in sky calm and but these out claims
were false
in reality Huawei had sold sky calm to
itself by claiming the sky calm was a
separate company and not an affiliate of
Huawei which it actually controlled
while way allegedly asserted that all of
its Iranian business was in compliance
with the American sanctions these
alleged false claims led banks to do
business with the company and therefore
to unknowingly violate our laws one bank
facilitated more than 100 million
dollars worth of sky calm transactions
through the United States in just four
years
Huawei allegedly lied about other
relationships as well in 2017 when one
Bank decided to terminate its global
banking relationship with Huawei
over a concern about risk the company
allegedly told other banks that Huawei
was distancing distancing itself from
the bank not the other way around
while we allegedly did this in an
attempt to among other things manipulate
those other banks into expanding and
maintaining their banking relationships
with Huawei there are additional
troubling allegations in the indictment
as well including that Huawei lied to
the federal government and attempted to
obstruct justice by concealing and
destroying evidence and by moving
potential government witnesses back to
China as has been widely reported in
December 2018 Canadian authorities
arrested Huawei CFO in Vancouver in
compliance with our request for her
provisional arrest pursuant to our
extradition treaty with Canada the
United States is currently seeking her
extradition we are deeply grateful to
the Government of Canada for its
assistance and it's steadfast commitment
to the rule of law I want to repeat that
these charges in today's indictments are
only allegations and the defendants are
presumed innocent until proven guilty in
a few moments US attorney Donohue and
first assistant Hayes will provide more
details on today's indictments but let
me just say two more things first when a
banks customers lie to it about their
sanctions related business that exposes
banks to the risk of violating the law
especially when they provide continue to
provide those bad actors access to our
US financial system and second as I told
high-level Chinese law enforcement
officials in August when I visited their
country we need more law enforcement
cooperation with China China should be
concerned about criminal activities by
Chinese companies and China should take
action we are proud that the United
States has the strongest economy in the
world I believe that it's no small part
due to our respect for the rule of law
criminals and bad actors can be certain
that they will not get away with
criminal activity but those who do
business in the United States can also
be certain that the Department of
Justice will protect them from criminals
no matter how powerful or influential
they are I think we have shown that
today and we will show that as these
cases move forward afternoon the charges
unsealed today are the result of years
of investigative work by the FBI and our
law enforcement partners both sets of
charges exposed huawei's brazen and
persistent actions to exploit American
companies and financial institutions and
to threaten the free and fair global
marketplace as you can tell from the
number and magnitude of the charges
Huawei and its senior executives
repeatedly refused to respect US law and
standard international business
practices Huawei also intentionally and
systematically sought to steal valuable
intellectual property from an American
company so he could circumvent
hard-earned time-consuming research and
gain an unfair market advantage in
pursuit of their commercial ambitions
Huawei relied on dishonest business
practices that contradict the very
economic principles that have allowed
American companies and the United States
to thrive and there is no place none for
this kind of criminal behavior in our
country or any other committed to the
rule of law the prosperity that drives
our economic security is inherently
linked to our national security
and the immense influence that the
Chinese government holds over Chinese
corporations like Huawei represents a
threat to both as Americans we should
all be concerned about the potential for
any company beholden to a foreign
government especially one that doesn't
share our values to burrow into the
American telecommunications market that
kind of access could give a foreign
government the capacity to maliciously
modify or steal information to conduct
undetected espionage or to exert
pressure or control these cases make
clear that as a country we have to
carefully consider the risks that
companies like Huawei pose if we're
going to allow them into our
telecommunications infrastructure
today's charges serve as a warning that
the FBI does not and will not tolerate
businesses that violate our laws
obstruct our justice and jeopardize our
national security we will not stand idly
by while any entity whether it's a
foreign government or corporation seeks
to criminally or unfairly undermine our
country's place in the world good
afternoon
let me thank the acting Attorney General
and everyone behind me for the
collective work here today as you heard
from the Attorney General this afternoon
in the Western District of Washington a
10 count indictment was unsealed
charging trade theft charging wire fraud

the indictment in the Western District

as set forth in the indictment our

a robot excuse me nicknamed tapi the

the emails show that while we wanted to

not have Huawei entities snuck into the

authorized to be there Huawei entities
directed employees to take photographs
take measurements and take other
protected information without permission
and finally when all this still did not

order for engineers in China to
replicate it to make matters worse when
confronted Huawei obstructed justice by

Huawei clearly knew that the thefts were
part of an organized effort by the
company in fact as the indictment
details this was the way Huawei operated
this was Huawei's mo during the time
period of the alleged crimes while we
announced a bonus program for its
employees worldwide but it would pay
cash to employees for stealing
confidential information from
competitors and yet and very tellingly

acknowledging this conduct would be
